narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Crystal Home Care LLC is a Chore Provider provider based in Kansas City, MO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $28.0M in Medicaid payments across 476K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $28.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
